name: zero-inbox-cats-for-gmail
description: Adds a random cat to the empty state of Gmail inbox
author: mordech

scripts.build:firefox: mkdir -pv dist/firefox && rsync --exclude="*.map" --exclude=".*" --exclude="@types" -r src/* dist/firefox && rsync manifest/firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json && zip -r dist/zero-inbox-cats-firefox.zip dist/firefox
scripts.build:chrome: mkdir -pv dist/chrome && rsync --exclude="*.map" --exclude=".*" --exclude="@types" -r src/* dist/chrome && rsync manifest/chrome.json dist/chrome/manifest.json && zip -r dist/zero-inbox-cats-chrome.zip dist/chrome
